Room.Name: Level One Circular Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the southwest corner, on the ground floor, of Castle Rutger.
Room.LongDescription: Looks like several doors along here all go into the same place, a barracks for the troops in the service of the castle. In time of emergency, the several doors provide a fast exit for the knights inside. There is a repair shop for weapons and armor through the iron gate.
